meanings.definition: One who supervises or directs others.
meanings.sent1: The overseer made sure everyone followed the rules.
meanings.sent2: The overseer of the construction site ensured the workers were safe.
meanings.sent3: The overseer tried to count all the jumping frogs, but they kept hopping away!
meanings.sent4: She was like an overseer of the stars, guiding them in their nightly dance.
meanings.sent5: The overseer's watchful eyes never missed a detail.

meanings.definition: A person who oversees or manages a project or group of workers.
meanings.sent1: The overseer checked the progress of the team's work.
meanings.sent2: The overseer of the event coordinated all the activities smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The overseer accidentally mixed up the paint colors, creating a rainbow wall!
meanings.sent4: She was the overseer of the garden, ensuring each flower bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The overseer's guidance led the team to success.
